member.name: T:Extensibility.ext_ConnectMode
member.summary: Informs the add-in about how it was loaded by the integrated development environment (IDE).

member.name: F:Extensibility.ext_ConnectMode.ext_cm_AfterStartup
member.summary: The add-in was loaded after Visual Studio started.

member.name: F:Extensibility.ext_ConnectMode.ext_cm_Startup
member.summary: The add-in was loaded when Visual Studio started.

member.name: F:Extensibility.ext_ConnectMode.ext_cm_External
member.summary: The add-in was loaded by an external client. (This setting is no longer used by Visual Studio.)

member.name: F:Extensibility.ext_ConnectMode.ext_cm_CommandLine
member.summary: The add-in was loaded from the command line.

member.name: F:Extensibility.ext_ConnectMode.ext_cm_Solution
member.summary: The add-in was loaded with a solution.

member.name: F:Extensibility.ext_ConnectMode.ext_cm_UISetup
member.summary: The add-in was loaded for user interface setup.

member.name: T:Extensibility.ext_DisconnectMode
member.summary: Informs the add-in about how it was unloaded by the integrated development environment (IDE).

member.name: F:Extensibility.ext_DisconnectMode.ext_dm_HostShutdown
member.summary: The add-in was unloaded when Visual Studio was shut down.

member.name: F:Extensibility.ext_DisconnectMode.ext_dm_UserClosed
member.summary: The add-in was unloaded while Visual Studio was running.

member.name: F:Extensibility.ext_DisconnectMode.ext_dm_UISetupComplete
member.summary: The add-in was unloaded after the user interface was set up.

member.name: F:Extensibility.ext_DisconnectMode.ext_dm_SolutionClosed
member.summary: The add-in was unloaded when the solution was closed.

member.name: T:Extensibility.IDTExtensibility2
member.summary: Hosts the event notifications that occur to add-ins, such as when they are loaded, unloaded, updated, and so forth.

member.name: M:Extensibility.IDTExtensibility2.OnAddInsUpdate(System.Array@)
member.summary: Occurs whenever an add-in is loaded or unloaded from the Visual Studio integrated development environment (IDE).
member.param: An empty array that you can use to pass host-specific data for use in the add-in.

member.name: M:Extensibility.IDTExtensibility2.OnBeginShutdown(System.Array@)
member.summary: Occurs whenever the Visual Studio integrated development environment (IDE) shuts down while an add-in is running.
member.param: An empty array that you can use to pass host-specific data for use in the add-in.

member.name: M:Extensibility.IDTExtensibility2.OnConnection(System.Object,Extensibility.ext_ConnectMode,System.Object,System.Array@)
member.summary: Occurs whenever an add-in is loaded into Visual Studio.
member.param: A reference to an instance of the integrated development environment (IDE), , which is the root object of the Visual Studio automation model.
An enumeration value that indicates the way the add-in was loaded into Visual Studio.
An reference to the add-in's own instance. This is stored for later use, such as determining the parent collection for the add-in.
An empty array that you can use to pass host-specific data for use in the add-in.

member.name: M:Extensibility.IDTExtensibility2.OnDisconnection(Extensibility.ext_DisconnectMode,System.Array@)
member.summary: Occurs whenever an add-in is unloaded from Visual Studio.
member.param: An enumeration value that informs an add-in why it was unloaded.
An empty array that you can use to pass host-specific data for use after the add-in unloads.

member.name: M:Extensibility.IDTExtensibility2.OnStartupComplete(System.Array@)
member.summary: Occurs whenever an add-in, which is set to load when Visual Studio starts, loads.
member.param: An empty array that you can use to pass host-specific data for use when the add-in loads.
